item.title: Fallen Earth
item.dc:creator: @Stunninhigh Stunninhigh
item.description:
@Stunninhigh wrote:

Very nice video, sadly I dont play anymore cause my computer cant handle the size but I plan to play again when I upgrade.

Read full topic

item.title: Fallen Earth
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

PVP there used to be good, but lately its meh. Lag and hackers took the fun away, that and the decreasing level of skill. I still log in time to time, and curbstomp some of the scrubs thinking theyre good.

Most pvpers record and even play in low settings, heres one in 1080p and fairly high settings, one of many fights my clan won… You can see how intense pvp could get when fighting in groups.
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xNotXr9__uQ[/youtube]

Edit : Unless you’re into roleplay, theres a pretty active rp community. This one time I was standing around new flagstaff and this guy raped me in an alley outta nowhere. Felt like the apocalypse 10/10 would get raped again.

Read full topic

item.title: Fallen Earth
item.dc:creator: @Stunninhigh Stunninhigh
item.description:
@Stunninhigh wrote:

Honestly I could not get into the fallout games, I remember putting in fallout new vegas and playing for 5mins and never played again… players on FE seem to think its way better than fallout.

item.title: Fallen Earth
item.dc:creator: @Stunninhigh Stunninhigh
item.description:
@Stunninhigh wrote:

tyb97:

I played it for a couple days a while back when it was kind of popular, wasn’t impressed, just another wanna-be big MMO.

It’s more popular now then what it was then, i meen every MMO has there flaws. I dont really know much about the game as I just started a few days ago. I really just like the game play and third/first person shooter
